samples.question: Tell me, where is your hometown?
samples.transcript: I was born and raised in the thriving metropolis Ho Chimun city which is located in the south of Vietnam as is a state-ofthe-art urban area. So lots of people live there. there is a really busy, lively and fast-paced lifestyle. >> Fantastic. Thank you so much.

samples.question: What do you like most about your hometown?
samples.transcript: >> there are various things I love about it. Firstly, there are many job opportunities to work in prestigious companies which is really important because people can earn a high salary and have a better quality of life. Secondly, there is a world-class education system. Therefore, students can develop and learn their skills in a high standard learning environment. >> Wonderful. that is wonderful. Thank you.

samples.question: Has your hometown changed much over the years?
samples.transcript: >> Absolutely. the most common vehicle in my city was bike. I mean most people cycle to work and to work and go to school. >> But now as you can see most people use motorbike to move around the city. Oh yes and moreover it was much greener as there were more parks and gardens but now they replaced by factories and buildings because of the industrialization. >> Fantastic. Thank you. And the final question for hometown.

samples.question: Do you prefer to have a fixed routine or a flexible one?

samples.question: The question for today, please, N is, could you describe a place in your city that you enjoy visiting?
samples.transcript: >> Thank you. >> Okay, N. Thank you so much. That is the end of the one minute.
samples.transcript_original: >> Thank you. >> Okay, N. Thank you so much. That is the end of the one minute.
samples.transcript_cleaned: >> Thank you. >> Okay, N. Thank you so much. That is the end of the one minute.

samples.question: When you are ready, could you please start now?
samples.transcript: >> Oh, yes. there are many fascinating places I could talk about. However, if I had to pick one, it would be the upto-date shopping center, Gigamon. it is located on Fambang Street in Ho Chi Min City about 15 minutes from my house. There are many activities. There are a variety of activities I could do there. Firstly, I usually tried some mouthwatering cuisine at high quality restaurants. and I highly recommend Caesaria, an Italian restaurant, and the food there is really delicious. And secondly, me and my friends always always take photos together when we get there. especially photo booth, a Korean style photography model, which is really trendy among young people. I can remember vividly that last year me and my best friend went to Gigamoon to celebrate her birthday. at that time I gave her a ceream cup as a gift and she is really loved it. And definitely I really I really appreciate that moment. and then we took some photos together to give some unforgettable memories. The reasons why I love that place, not only because it h is delicious food, but also it has sentimental value from to me as is witnessed all my moments and memories with my family and friends who I love the most in the world. in the future, I will definitely go visit visit that place again and again. >> Wow. Thank you so much. That was I really enjoyed that. I have not been there, but I will try to go there in the future. Thank you so much, Ne. I will just take that back. Thank you, >> N. I want to continue talking about cities and urban life.

samples.question: Now, could you tell me please, why do so many people prefer living in cities nowadays?

Moreover, people can find some services like hospitals or schools easily which is really necessary for their basic needs. >> Thank you very much.

samples.question: Tell me, do people have enough free time today compared to in the past?
samples.transcript: From my point of view, I think there is less time for them to relax than in the past as people now have much or have a huge number of assignments they have to do in their work or their study. for example in in the in Vietnam in the past students used to have full three months summer holidays but now they only have around two and a half months even they need to they need to participate in some extra classes like a math or English class. samples.question: Do you like history as a subject in your school and why?
